sqlMap.select: SELECT A.*, (SELECT RES_NA FROM AS_LANG_TRANS B WHERE A.COMPO_ID = B.RES_ID) COMPO_NAME, (SELECT FUNC_DESC FROM AS_FUNC C WHERE A.FUNC_ID = C.FUNC_ID) FUNC_NAME FROM AS_COMPO_FUNC A where A.COMPO_ID = #compoId:VARCHAR# ORDER BY A.COMPO_ID ASC
sqlMap.update: UPDATE AS_COMPO_FUNC SET IS_WR_LOG = #isWrLog:VARCHAR#, IS_NEVER_USE = #isNeverUse:VARCHAR# WHERE COMPO_ID = #compoId:VARCHAR# AND FUNC_ID =#funcId:VARCHAR#
